solution_line_template: She has a total of {pears}+{oranges}+{apples} = <<{pears}+{oranges}+{apples}={total_fruits_initial}>>{total_fruits_initial} fruits.

She gives her sister {given_per_fruit_type} pears+{given_per_fruit_type} oranges+{given_per_fruit_type} apples = <<{given_per_fruit_type}+{given_per_fruit_type}+{given_per_fruit_type}={fruits_given_to_sister}>>{fruits_given_to_sister} fruits.

After giving her sister {given_per_fruit_type} of each fruit, she has {total_fruits_initial}-{fruits_given_to_sister} = <<{total_fruits_initial}-{fruits_given_to_sister}={fruits_left}>>{fruits_left} fruits left.
